transcript:
Customer: [unintelligible] you have called speaking to someone else. You can wait or call.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Boliye boliye sir.
Customer: Ha ji sir ha ji sir. Ye aapne jo complaint kiya na address ko lekar ke service ko lekar ke.
Executive: Ha lead nahi ho raha hai. Wo change ho gaya. Near places ka lead nahi ho raha hai sir.
Executive: Sir near places to maine kar diya sir maine aapko filter bataya na filter udhar location ka filter aata hai na.
Customer: Ab usme dekhiye na location ka option hai. Wo filter lagao haveri abhi haveri ka lead udhar dikhta hai aapko.
Customer: Ha haveri.
Executive: Wo hindi wali madam available hota?
Customer: Nahi nahi hota.
Executive: Nahi hota wo kab aate office?
Customer: Ha sir.
Executive: Hindi wali madam kab aate office?
Customer: Ek ghante ek ghanta mein aata.
Executive: Ek ghanta mein aata na.
Customer: Aapna ek ghanta aap mere ko call karo main us madam se madam ko samjhata hu wo aapko aapko samjha deta hu wo.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Okay abhi 4:30 hota hai na 4:35 main 5:30 ko call karta hu aapko.
Customer: 5:30 okay.
Executive: Okay ye aap pehle aate madam to aap mere ko call karo sir.
Customer: Okay okay sir.
Executive: Okay sir okay okay.
Customer: Contact by now.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting leads from near places.

- Wants to talk to the Hindi speaking executive.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about applying location filter.

- Executive will call back at 5:30 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 5:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location filter, hindi executive
